1.title: A Duel in Ruins: Part I
1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

2.title: A Duel in Ruins: Part II
2.plot: Yuma is put to the ultimate test when a Number Guardian traps his friends and forces him to battle for their freedom!

3.title: The Dark Mist Rises: Part 1
3.plot: Yuma searches for the second Mythyrian Number and ends up finding an old nemesis who is out for revenge!

4.title: The Dark Mist Rises: Part 2
4.plot: Every time Astral attacks, he puts Yuma's life in danger, but if he doesn't attack, he's a goner himself! It's a no-win situation in the cruelest duel yet!

5.title: Barian Vengeance: Part I
5.plot: Alito's back in the ring to take down Yuma, but a fair fight isn't in the cards when Alito has one of Yuma's friends in his corner!

6.title: Barian Vengeance: Part II
6.plot: Nistro's under Alito's control, and it's up to Yuma and Dextra to free him! Can this tag team duo bob and weave their way past Alito's attacks, or will this Barian knock out any chances they have of winning?

7.title: Put to the Test: Part 1
7.plot: The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite's skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!

8.title: Put to the Test: Part 2
8.plot: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

9.title: Furry Fury
9.plot: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there's more to Girag than meets the eye - like a red nose and whiskers!

10.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
10.plot: It's rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

11.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 2
11.plot: The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!

12.title: A World of Chaos: Part 1
12.plot: Earth and Astral World are under attack! Yuma and Astral are the only ones who can stop it, but saving their planets may come at the ultimate price...

13.title: A World of Chaos: Part 2
13.plot: The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!

14.title: Memory Thief: Part 1
14.plot: Someone's stealing memories, and the Super Secret Numbers Club are going to find out who! But when the hunters become the hunted, Yuma's friends quickly realize that they need help from an exterminator!

15.title: Memory Thief: Part 2
15.plot: Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories! Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?

16.title: Tentacles of Terror, Part 1
16.plot: With Vector's patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma! Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!

17.title: Tentacles of Terror, Part 2
17.plot: Shark and Quattro struggle to keep their heads above water as they battle the Barian duelist from the deep, Chironex!

18.title: Now or Never: Part 1
18.plot: Yuma's all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma's plans!

19.title: Now or Never: Part 2
19.plot: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner's attacks!

20.title: Mission: Astral World, Part 1
20.plot: Yuma's mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

21.title: Mission: Astral World, Part 2
21.plot: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

22.title: Mission: Astral World, Part 3
22.plot: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

23.title: Mission: Astral World, Part 4
23.plot: With Astral's fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World's Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

24.title: Assimilation: Part 1
24.plot: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang's heels!

25.title: Assimilation: Part 2
25.plot: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

1.title: Go with the Flow: Part 1
1.plot: In Heartland City, Yuma Tsukumo aspires to be the world's best duelist. Despite this, he is not a good duelist, since he usually loses to others. When he ends up Dueling Shark, a bully known to have pro-level skills, odd things begin to happen and Yuma's story begins.

2.title: Go with the Flow: Part 2
2.plot: It's a dueling disaster for Yuma when a mysterious visitor from another galaxy suddenly appears, putting his duel with Shark in serious jeopardy!

3.title: In the End: Part 1
3.plot: When the city is thrust into chaos after several of its computers become infected by a malicious virus, Yuma and Tori set out to find the culprit!

4.title: In the End: Part 2
4.plot: Yuma must figure out a way to outduel his math teacher Mr. Kay before his life points are completely subtracted and the virus planted in the city's computer system goes... viral!

5.title: Flipping Out: Part 1
5.plot: When fellow classmate Flip offers Yuma an Xyz Monster, Tori and Bronk literally flip out and warn Yuma to stay clear of this two-faced trouble maker - a task that turns out to be easier said than done!

6.title: Flipping Out: Part 2
6.plot: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat Flip or risk losing his Utopia card... and Astral forever!

7.title: The Sparrow: Part 1
7.plot: When Nelson Andrews, star of the hit TV series 'The Sparrow,' becomes possessed by a Number Card, Yuma challenges him to a duel, putting Astral's safety on the line!

8.title: The Sparrow: Part 2
8.plot: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat The Sparrow and his powerful Galaxy Queen before Nelson and Astral disappear forever!

9.title: Feline Frenzy
9.plot: In order to find his missing friend Tori, Yuma must face off against a feline fanatic who has the purr-fect answers to his every move!

10.title: Shark Attack
10.plot: Yuma discovers that Shark has started running with the wrong crowd and given up dueling. Can Yuma hook Shark back into battling, or are Shark's dueling days done forever?

11.title: The Pack: Part 1
11.plot: When Yuma learns that Shark is going to be set up to take the fall for stealing a priceless deck, Yuma challenges Shark's thug friends to a duel! Can Yuma put a stop to The Pack's thieving plan and save Shark's skin, or will these thugs prove too powerful?

12.title: The Pack: Part 2
12.plot: Yuma and Shark's tag team battle against The Pack reaches a fevery pitch, for if Yuma loses, he also loses Utopia!

13.title: The Number Hunter: Part 1
13.plot: Yuma and Astral face their toughest battle ever when they are forced to duel a mysterious individual who hunts Number Cards!

14.title: The Number Hunter: Part 2
14.plot: Kite overpowers Yuma with Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon, as Yuma desperately tries to turn the Duel around.

15.title: Training Days: Part 1
15.plot: The legendary Dark Magician and Blue-Eyes White Dragon come out of retirement when a wise old man named Master Roku challenges Yuma to duel!

16.title: Training Days: Part 2
16.plot: After challenging Master Roku's former student to a duel, Yuma relies on his master's teachings in order to defeat the evil Kaze and save the Duel Sanctuary's Legendary Deck!

17.title: It's in the Cards: Part 1
17.plot: When a mysterious fortune teller agrees to help out Yuma's friends, they soon find themselves in a terrifying situation that no one ever saw coming! Can Yuma rescue his pals, or will the all-knowing Fortuno see to it that Yuma doesn't succeed?

18.title: It's in the Cards: Part 2
18.plot: Yuma must figure out a way to defeat the mysterious and all-knowing Fortuno if he wants to save his friends, his Number Card and his soul!

19.title: The Edge of the World
19.plot: While on the way to School Spirit Day, Yuma realizes the Golden Key his father gave him is missing. As Astral and Yuma retrace his steps, Yuma shares the exciting story behind the Golden Key's origins!

20.title: Roots of the Problem
20.plot: When Yuma gets into a fight with Bronk, their friendship is soon put to the u ltimate test when an evil Number Card takes control of Yuma!

21.title: Battle with the Bot
21.plot: When Orbital 7 crashes into Lillybot, it's love at first sensor! So when he discovers his beloved bot is in trouble, he motors to free her from her tormentor... Yuma!

22.title: The Shark Hunter
22.plot: Shark tries to stop Kite from stealing Yuma's Golden Key by challenging him to a duel! Can Shark sink his teeth into Kite's life points and save Yuma's prized possession, or will Kite's cunning skills sink any chance Shark has of winning?

23.title: Hunting Down the Hunter: Part 1
23.plot: With his Golden Key in Kite's possession, Yuma must hunt down the Number Hunter if he ever wants to see Astral again!

24.title: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 2
24.plot: While Yuma continues to search for Astral and the Golden Key, Astral continues to search for a way to defeat Kite and save all his Number Cards!

25.title: Frozen in Time
25.plot: When an unexpected phenomenon stops time, Kite is able to gain the upper hand by tapping into Astral's memories and witnessing firsthand the battles that he and Yuma have fought together.

1.title: Let the Duels Begin
1.plot: With the World Duel Carnival about to begin, Yuma gets set to take on the best duelists from around the world... that is, until he realizes he never entered!

2.title: A Team Performance
2.plot: The World Duel Carnival kicks off when Yuma is challenged by Striker, a soccer player turned duelist who has one goal in mind - scoring a victory!

3.title: Heavy Metal
3.plot: Hoping to keep the momentum going in the wake of his latest victory, Yuma rises up to the challenge of a pint-sized duelist and his deck of monster machines!

4.title: Love Hurts
4.plot: Yuma broke Anna's heart years ago, and now she's back for revenge. If Yuma loses, he has to be Anna's boyfriend forever.

5.title: No Tomato
5.plot: Yuma faces his toughest test to date when he challenges the tomato loving Tombo to a duel! Can Yuma overc ome his hate for tomatoes and be victorious, or will his taste buds only be serving up defeat?

6.title: Life Is a Carnival: Part 1
6.plot: Yuma gets taken for a wild ride when Kari's friend steals an extremely lucky card from the local museum! Relying on pure skill, Yuma must figure out a way to beat the luckiest guy in the world!

7.title: Life Is a Carnival: Part 2
7.plot: Yuma's duel atop an out-of-control monorail takes a turn for the worse when his opponent plays a Number Card that guarantees a win every time.

8.title: Foolish Fans
8.plot: It's a dream come true for Caswell and Bronk when their favorite duelist in the world challenges them to a duel!

9.title: Shark Bait
9.plot: Out for revenge, Shark looks to sink his teeth into a duel with Quattro, but he instead gets hooked into an underwater battle with Quattro's sinister sibling!

10.title: Bad Developments: Part 1
10.plot: Yuma hunts down a photographer whose pictures can predict the future! Unfortunately for Yuma and his friend Tori, it's a future that's not so bright!

11.title: Bad Developments: Part 2
11.plot: Tori's future is literally up in the air when the damaged airship she is on takes a turn for the worse - just as Yuma's opponent Cameron predicted! Can Yuma save his best friend by winning his duel, or are the future photos Cameron snapped set in stone?!

12.title: Double Jeopardy: Part 1
12.plot: After accidentally falling asleep, Flip wakes up to a nightmare realization - he just slept through the first day of the World Duel Carnival!

13.title: Double Jeopardy: Part 2
13.plot: With Astral missing, Yuma must rely on his skills alone if he wants to defeat Nistro and Dextra and save his deck and spot in the World Duel Carnival!

14.title: Pets Peeved
14.plot: When Yuma's Heart Pieces are swiped by a pack of stray dogs, Cathy calls on her feline friends to help hunt them down! After finding the hounds' hideout, Cathy is challenged by the pack leader to a duel!

15.title: About Hart
15.plot: After using his powers to escape from Heartland City, Hart unleashes a path of destruction that only Yuma can help stop!

16.title: Losing Hart
16.plot: As Kite desperately searches for his brother, Vetrix puts his diabolical plan for revenge in motion!

17.title: A Dubious Duo
17.plot: Vetrix continues his quest to drain Hart of all his powers!

18.title: The Dragon Awakens
18.plot: Kite must learn to work with Yuma if he wants to take down Trey and Quattro and rescue Hart! Can Kite put his pride to the side and accept Yuma's help, or will Kite's ego end up sacrificing Hart's safety?!

19.title: Rock and a Hard Place
19.plot: Faced with tough decisions, Yuma decides to run away from his problems and search for his father until Master Roku confronts him, forcing him to face a few hard truths.

20.title: Ruffled Feathers
20.plot: The race for entry into the World Duel Carnival sees Nistro clash with TV superhero The Sparrow. The feathers fly as the fierce duel hits a fever pitch!

21.title: Family Leave
21.plot: Trey makes an unexpected visit to Yuma's house and discovers the secret behind Yuma's incredible dueling skills - over lunch!

22.title: Sky's the Limit
22.plot: After accepting Trey's challenge to a duel, Yuma soon learns that Trey has acquired a dark and dangerous new power!

23.title: Exit: Astral
23.plot: With the bond between Astral and Yuma broken, Trey takes aim at the rest of Yuma's life points!

24.title: Crestfallen
24.plot: The back-and-forth battle between Trey and Yuma reaches its climactic conclusion! Can Yuma defeat Trey without Astral's assistance, or will Trey triumph, leaving Yuma one Heart Piece short of making it to the finals?!

29.title: The Field of Chaos: Number 96, the Incarnation of Insanity!
29.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Party Panic
1.plot: Yuma and his friends get all decked out for the event of the year - the World Duel Carnival Finals party! But when Yuma forgets his invite, can he find a way into the festivities, or will he be forced to hit the road and head home early?!

2.title: Roller Duel
2.plot: It's time for the World Duel Carnival Finals! But prepare for a world of twists and turns because the finalists will be dueling on a roller coaster! Can Yuma handle the ups and downs of the competition, or will he be sent for a loop?!

3.title: Roller Coaster Rampage
3.plot: It's time for the World Duel Carnival Finals! But prepare for a world of twists and turns because the finalists will be dueling on a roller coaster! Can Yuma handle the ups and downs of the competition, or will he be sent for a loop?!

4.title: Test Your Luck
4.plot: The World Duel Carnival takes a dark turn as the finalists descend into the Dragon's Den, a dark and dangerous duel track that will bring defeat for many a duelist! Can Yuma make his way through the treacherous track, or will the Dragon's Den deliver a knockout blow?!

5.title: Welcome to the Jungle
5.plot: The heat's on when Vetrix and Dextra duel in the jungle to decide who moves on to the World Duel Carnival semifinals!

6.title: Portal of Doom
6.plot: Quinton takes a timeout during his duel against Kite to reveal the long hidden mystery about Yuma's father's disappearance!

7.title: Cosmic Chaos
7.plot: Quinton and Kite's confrontation in the cosmos comes to a climactic conclusion!

8.title: Depths of Darkness
8.plot: Shark finally faces off with his archenemy, Quattro! Will Shark get his long awaited revenge, or will he end up sleeping with the fishes?!

9.title: Swimming with Sharks
9.plot: It's the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro! If Shark doesn't make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

10.title: Rockin' and Rollin'
10.plot: There's chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals! Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yuma's world?

11.title: Doctor Visit
11.plot: When Yuma's deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it! But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

12.title: Duel of Destiny: Part 1
12.plot: Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he's being baited! Does Yuma learn this far too late to escape a sinister Shark attack?

13.title: Duel of Destiny: Part 2
13.plot: This is it! Yuma's jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish! Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?

14.title: The Hart of the Matter
14.plot: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible! Can Kite rise above Vetrix's heinous handicap, or has this undefeated duelist finally met his match?

15.title: Change of Hart
15.plot: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish! As the battle climaxes, Yuma sets out to free Kite's brother Hart from Vetrix's grasp, while Kite duels knowing full well that Hart's safety hangs in the balance! Can either of them rise above the risks, or are they both fated to fail?

16.title: Sphere of Fear: Part 1
16.plot: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion! Can Yuma figure out a way to outduel Vetrix, or will Vetrix and his devastating deck destroy Yuma's chance of being a champion?!

17.title: Sphere of Fear: Part 2
17.plot: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix's shocking secret!

18.title: Sphere of Fear: Part 3
18.plot: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma's duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix's unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear: his soul, his Numbers and... Astral?

19.title: The Countdown Begins
19.plot: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker's diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

20.title: A Trio's Challenge: Part 1
20.plot: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker's fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

21.title: A Trio's Challenge: Part 2
21.plot: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

22.title: A Trio's Challenge: Part 3
22.plot: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World... and themselves!

23.title: Kite Plight, Part 1
23.plot: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma's about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

24.title: Kite Plight: Part II
24.plot: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma's dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

1.title: Attack of the Barians: Part 1
1.plot: Yuma's battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him... Astral?

2.title: Attack of the Barians: Part 2
2.plot: Yuma's battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him... Astral?

3.title: Hard Knox
3.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

4.title: Rule Duel
4.plot: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who's been corrupted by the Barians!

5.title: The Adventures of Artemus Stanleyus
5.plot: Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel! Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?

6.title: Doom in Bloom
6.plot: Shark's sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!

7.title: Rivals in the Ring
7.plot: A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma's Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!

8.title: The Friendship Games
8.plot: When Yuma's buddies can't stop bickering, it's time for them to face-off in the Friendship Games, a sports dueling competition with surprises around every corner... including Barians!

9.title: Sphere Cube Calamity, Part I
9.plot: A dangerous new Barian enemy arrives, and he's bringing one of his world's most powerful weapons to take down Yuma and Astral!

10.title: Sphere Cube Calamity, Part II
10.plot: Mizar batters Yuma to his breaking point... until a surprise duelist steps in to take down Mizar and go claw-to-claw with his Galaxy-Eyes!

11.title: Playing Defense
11.plot: In order to set Yuma straight, Shark steals Yuma's Key! Can Yuma find the courage to face Shark, or will Yuma's fears leave him cowering for cover?!

12.title: Counter Offensive: Part 1
12.plot: Let's get ready to duuuuuuuuel! Yuma steps into the ring with Alito, but can he dodge this Barian's Battlin' Boxers before they send him to the canvas for a ten count?!

13.title: Counter Offensive: Part 2
13.plot: It's Round 2 of the heavyweight battle between Yuma and Alito! Can Yuma bob and weave his way around Alito's attacks, or will this Barian's fancy footwork finish him off for good?

14.title: Dual Duel: Part 1
14.plot: Girag's got revenge on his mind and Ray in his sights, but when Yuma steps in to save the day, the Ray Way steers Yuma off course!

15.title: Dual Duel: Part 2
15.plot: Girag has Yuma and Ray in the palm of his hand, but will a secret that Ray has been keeping help our heroes escape the clutches of this Barian behemoth?!

16.title: Darkness Dawns
16.plot: Astral and Yuma face a challenge so daunting that they must turn to their biggest adversary for help!

17.title: You Give Love a Bot Name
17.plot: Love hurts and Yuma's about to find out why! Yuma broke Anna's heart years ago, and now she's back for revenge! If Yuma loses, he has to be Anna's boyfriend... forever!

18.title: Take a Chance
18.plot: Shark's trying to control Rio's life and she's not taking it anymore! Will this family feud turn into a feeding frenzy for Shark, or will Rio put her brother's winning streak on ice?!

19.title: An Imperfect Couple: Part 1
19.plot: The gang's dressed up as their favorite monsters for the school's fun fair, but when Anna crashes the festivities, the party ends for Yuma!

20.title: An Imperfect Couple: Part 2
20.plot: Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!

21.title: Enter Vector
21.plot: Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!

22.title: The Search for Shadows
22.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

23.title: Shadows of Deception
23.plot: The Barians are on the attack, and Yuma is ready to risk everything to rescue Ray! But when Vector reveals a terrifying truth, Yuma's dream of saving Ray turns into a nightmare!

24.title: Sinister Shadows
24.plot: Still reeling from Vector's revelation that he and Ray Shadows are one and the same, Yuma looks to make Vector pay for all his lies! But with Astral learning of Yuma's own deceptions, will Yuma have to face Vector alone?!

25.title: Shadows End
25.plot: When the city is thrust into chaos after several of its computers become infected by a malicious virus, Yuma and Tori set out to find the culprit!

1.title: Battle with the Barians
1.plot: Yuma befriends a broken Litterbot only to discover that it has been programmed to do the dirty work for a wanted jewel thief. Can Yuma put a stop to this thief's thieving ways, or will Yuma's newest friend trash his plan to stop him?

2.title: Fight for a Friend
2.plot: Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash! Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!

3.title: Farewell for a Friend
3.plot: The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion! Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?

4.title: Settling the Score, Part 1
4.plot: Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!

5.title: Settling the Score, Part 2
5.plot: As Quinton and Trey's devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian! Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!

6.title: Fists of Fury, Part 1
6.plot: Yuma and Astral's race to face Don Thousand is stopped cold by the hot-blooded Alito, now brainwashed by the Barian deity! Can they think fast enough to free Alito of Don Thousand, or will he take the two down for the count?!

7.title: Fists of Fury, Part 2
7.plot: Yuma and Astral duel desperately to try and turn an old enemy into their newest ally, but with Don Thousand in Alito's corner, Yuma and Astral find themselves up against the ropes!

8.title: Power Play
8.plot: Vector sets his sights on squashing Marin and Dumon, and there's nothing Shark can do but watch his sister and best friend squirm before his eyes.

9.title: Barian vs. Barian
9.plot: The thunderous battle between Marin, Dumon and Vector shatters expectations as it nears its startling end! Meanwhile, Alito stands tall against his former friend, the Barian behemoth - Girag!

10.title: Vector the Victor
10.plot: Marin's duel with Vector charges to its climactic conclusion! Can Marin outduel this venomous villain, or will Vector remain invincible?!

11.title: Dragon Strife: Part 1
11.plot: The long foreshadowed faceoff is finally here! Kite and Mizar go toe-to-toe to settle who is the one true Galaxy-Eyes master!

12.title: Dragon Strife: Part 2
12.plot: The fierce face-off between Kite and Mizar soars to new heights as their battle to determine the one true Galaxy-Eyes master roars to a finish!

13.title: The Forsaken Palace
13.plot: Nash races to face Vector, but with Vector's enhanced strength, he may be speeding towards his own demise!

14.title: Clash of the Emperors
14.plot: While Nash and Vector's danger-fueled duel hits dizzying new heights of havoc, the truth behind Vector's dark past is revealed!

15.title: The New World
15.plot: Yuma teams up with an unlikely ally to take down the great Barian deity, Don Thousand! Can this twosome draw out a victory, or will Don Thousand douse any hope these heroes have of being victorious?

16.title: The Source Code
16.plot: Yuma and Shark's battle with Don Thousand takes a treacherous turn when the great Barian deity reveals he can rewrite their cards into entirely different cards! Can Yuma and Shark defeat a foe who can change their every move?

17.title: A Thousand Ways to Lose
17.plot: Yuma and Shark turn the tides and put Don Thousand on the brink of defeat, but DonThousand still has a thousand tricks up his sleeve!

18.title: The Fate of Three Worlds
18.plot: Once friends, now foes - Yuma and Shark face off in a battle where winning could mean losing everything!

19.title: The Battle of Three Worlds
19.plot: Winning comes with the ultimate price when Yuma realizes victory will cost more than just losing his friendship with Shark, it will mean losing Shark forever!

20.title: The Future of Three Worlds
20.plot: Expect the unexpected as the game-changing conclusion of Yuma's duel against Shark flares to a frenzied finish!

21.title: Last First Duel
21.plot: Having gathered all one hundred Numbers, Astral is finally prepared to fulfill his mission - to destroy Barian World! But in order to see his mission through, Astral will have to destroy his friendship with Yuma first!

22.title: Outclassed and Outmatched
22.plot: The battle between Yuma and Astral rages on as the best of friends become the fiercest of foes!

23.title: Forever ZEXAL
23.plot: Feel the flow for the final time as Yuma and Astral high-five the sky in the cosmic conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh! ZEXAL!

-1.title: Hard Knox
-1.plot: Faced with tough decisions, Yuma d ecides to run away from his problems and search for his father until Master Roku confronts him and forces him to face a few hard truths!

imdb.plot outline: The story takes place in the near future in a city called Heartland. The story focuses on Yuma Tsukumo, a young duelist who strives to become the Duel Monsters champion, despite being an amateur. One day, during a duel with a school bully, a mysterious spirit called Astral appears before him, and helps him to win. Astral explains to Yuma he is searching for his lost memories, which have been transformed into 99 Xyz Monsters cards called Numbers and have been scattered across the globe. The Numbers have the ability to possess the duelists who own them and bring out their darkest desires. In order to recover his memories, Astral teams up with Yuma in order to recover the Numbers cards. Using the powers of Zexal, the two must compete with Numbers Hunters, who seek to claim the Numbers cards for themselves in order to destroy Astral's homeworld.
imdb.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal
